member.name: T:Vector.Scripting.Execution
member.summary: Provides access to execution control in CANoe.

member.name: F:Vector.Scripting.Execution.WAIT_ABORTED
member.summary: Result of a wait showing that the wait has been aborted.

member.name: F:Vector.Scripting.Execution.WAIT_TIMEOUT
member.summary: Result of a wait showing that the wait has timed out.

member.name: M:Vector.Scripting.Execution.Wait(System.Int32)
member.summary: Waits a certain timespan. During the wait, the measurement and simulation are not blocked.
member.param: duration of the wait, in milliseconds
member.exception: thrown if the method is not used inside a snippet or test module
